title: Europe agrees to sweeping new regulations for tech platforms - CNN
content:
1. Europe agrees to sweeping new regulations for tech platforms  CNN
  2. EU law targets Big Tech over hate speech, disinformation  NPR
  3. As Europe Approves New Tech Laws, the U.S. Falls Further Behind  The New York Times
  4. New E.U. landmark law targets Big Tech firms over hate speech, disinformation  NBC News
  5. Tech Companies Face Billions in Fines Under EU Content Rules  Bloomberg
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: European policymakers have reached agreement on a sweeping package of new regulations for tech platforms that could mean big changes in oversight for everything from social media algorithms to digital advertising â€” and with potential ramifications worldwide.
